00061 void Client::create_table(const String &name, const String &schema) {
00062   int error;
00063   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->create_table(name.c_str(), schema.c_str())) != Error::OK)
00064     throw Exception(error);
00065 }

00079 uint32_t Client::get_table_id(const String &name) {
00080   int error;
00081   String table_file = (String)"/hypertable/tables/" + name;
00082   DynamicBuffer value_buf(0);
00083   HandleCallbackPtr nullHandleCallback;
00084   uint64_t handle;
00085   uint32_t uval;
00086 
00090   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open(table_file.c_str(), OPEN_FLAG_READ, nullHandleCallback, &handle)) != Error::OK)
00091     throw Exception(error, (String)"Hyperspace::open(" + table_file + ") failed");
00092 
00096   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->attr_get(handle, "table_id", value_buf)) != Error::OK)
00097     throw Exception(error, (String)"Hyperspace::attr_get(file='" + table_file + "', attr=table_id) failed");
00098 
00102   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle)) != Error::OK)
00103     throw Exception(error);
00104 
00105   assert(value_buf.fill() == sizeof(int32_t));
00106 
00107   memcpy(&uval, value_buf.base, sizeof(int32_t));
00108 
00109   return uval;
00110 }

00116 String Client::get_schema(const String &name) {
00117   int error;
00118   String schema;
00119   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->get_schema(name.c_str(), schema)) != Error::OK)
00120     throw Exception(error);
00121   return schema;

00128 void Client::get_tables(std::vector<String> &tables) {
00129   int error;
00130   uint64_t handle;
00131   HandleCallbackPtr nullHandleCallback;
00132   std::vector<struct Hyperspace::DirEntryT> listing;
00133 
00134   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->open("/hypertable/tables", OPEN_FLAG_READ, nullHandleCallback, &handle)) != Error::OK)
00135     throw Exception(error);
00136 
00137   if ((error = m_hyperspace_ptr->readdir(handle, listing)) != Error::OK)
00138     throw Exception(error);
00139 
00140   for (size_t i=0; i<listing.size(); i++) {
00141     if (!listing[i].isDirectory)
00142       tables.push_back(listing[i].name);
00143   }
00144 
00145   m_hyperspace_ptr->close(handle);
00146 
00147 }

00150 void Client::drop_table(const String &name, bool if_exists) {
00151   int error;
00152   if ((error = m_master_client_ptr->drop_table(name.c_str(), if_exists)) != Error::OK)
00153     throw Exception(error);

00167 void Client::initialize(const String &config_file) {
00168   time_t master_timeout;
00169 
00170   m_props_ptr = new Properties(config_file);
00171 
00172   m_comm = new Comm();
00173   m_conn_manager_ptr = new ConnectionManager(m_comm);
00174 
00175   m_hyperspace_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(m_comm, m_props_ptr);
00176   while (!m_hyperspace_ptr->wait_for_connection(2)) {
00177     cout << "Waiting for connection to Hyperspace..." << flush;
00178     poll(0, 0, 5000);
00179     cout << endl << flush;
00180   }
00181 
00182   m_app_queue_ptr = new ApplicationQueue(1);
00183 
00184   master_timeout = m_props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Master.Client.Timeout", 180);
00185 
00186   m_master_client_ptr = new MasterClient(m_conn_manager_ptr, m_hyperspace_ptr, master_timeout, m_app_queue_ptr);
00187   if (m_master_client_ptr->initiate_connection(0) != Error::OK) {
00188     HT_ERROR("Unable to establish connection with Master, exiting...");
00189     exit(1);
00190   }
00191 }
